name: Stardust Cocktail
description: The mixologist Chantal Tseng created this variation of a kir royale for a literary cocktail evening in tribute to Neil Gaiman’s novel "Stardust." The subtle addition of bergamot, found in Earl Grey tea, freshens up an old standard.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the crème de cassis, tea and Champagne in a mixing glass, add ice and stir until chilled. Strain into a coupe glass, then garnish with a lemon peel.
